featured.text: I even have some stuff made out of bamboo/cotton blend.
It is refined to remove its impurities and blended to improve flavor, and is recommended for all-purpose cooking.

definition.zh_def: 混合，將兩種或多種物質或元素結合在一起。
definition.en_def: To mix two or more substances or elements together.
definition.example: She decided to blend different fruits to make a smoothie.
